--- ### @mixin visually-shown Visually show elements that were visually hidden before. #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | | ---- | ---- | ------- | | `position` | `string` | `static` | | `overflow` | `string` | `visible` | | `backface-visibility` | `string` | `visible` | | `clip` | `string` | `auto` | | `height` | `string` | `auto` | | `width` | `string` | `auto` | | `margin` | `string` | `0` | | `padding` | `string` | `0` | | `border` | `string` | `none` | #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include visually-shown; } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} .foo { position: static; overflow: visible; backface-visibility: visible; clip: auto; height: auto; width: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 0; } {% endhighlight %}
